reviews.review: Very disappointing ending, even the extra
This gonna be the best MCU movie, Thanos in this movie are better than the comic version, the storyline is good. and I love the ending. VFX, SFX erverything is ok.
The best marvel yet, worth to watch.
Great movie from start to finish or not finished

After all, this is the cinematic universe of our beloved marvel heroes. Such intricate weaving of Fandom with casual movie going is difficult at the best of times. This movie came together in such a splendid intertwining of deep marvel comic cannon, along with seat of your pants summer blockbuster action. They did it. As a seasoned comic book fan, I gotta say, they've done this the justice they were capable of. Full credit to the portrayal of Thanos, and the excellently balanced heroes that pop in and out of the action to attempt to that him. This is exactly the way to make this movie.
Forget any expectations, roll with the emotions and enjoy the ride, cause this is akin to the empire strikes back!
I could have waited for the DVD

A fantastic movie that adds real world stakes, dramatic moments of gut punches and heart wrenching action sequences to a dark and intense film. Well written and giving a large cast of characters their due. Everyone has a moment to shine. Pacing was off in some parts but this is an epic culmination film with a cast of 34 people.  Everyone    should know this is a prelude or part 1 to Avengers 4 part 2. The cliffhanger ending was sad, emotional, shocking and more. I give this film a 93 out of 100. It is among the top 3 marvel films just for the chances it takes in the film. It's long with some setup but in the end it is needed and justified. Very funny moments of humor and levity . Everyone brought their A game. Definitely met my expectations.

Incredible! An epic, awesome, extravaganza, packed w/humor, strong story, amazing action, serious tone interwoven. One of the best if not THE best movie superhero villain ever in Thanos!! A Marvel Magnum Opus!! Will be seeing it again very soon!
This was amazing the best movie i ever watched trhiling exitinig stop talking and go see this amazing movie 10/10
